replies.msg:
That's the problem nowadays,isn't it?
No wonder we face extinction .

Pride is a weapon.
A sword to be used against our enemies.
But don't be deceived.They are strong.
Strong than we are.

Our enemies live among us.
The Chinese invaders who come to out country to destroy us and take over our lives .

The Chinese invaders ! Who are now and who have always been
Unwelcome!! Unwanted!!
And they are everywhere .
Invading our government,stripping is of our savings , raping our families and our heritage.

It's time to fight back.
